::Stratus::

Stratus waits patiently after chewing through one of the larger plants that was holding the ship down, swimming forward as Abominus comes into view.

"Follow me, Abominus," he replies slowly, but probably not slowly enough, turning around and swimming toward the ship.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: My turn with Abominus. :)
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Abominus continues to sink to the bottom of the Azores islands, as his
> computers automatically begin to expend energy to make up for the
> increased pressure. This is just as well, as the Decepticon war machine
> wouldnt have a clue as to what pressure means. He continues to look
> around, but not with curiosity, for he is not intelligent enough for
> such an emotion. He is simply looking for anything that could be
> considered hostile, as his massive frame finally reaches the ocean
> floor. He takes one plodding step forwards, then another, causing the
> ocean floor to first rumble, then on one step to crack, as he moves
> towards the signal his computers provide him with.
> 
> Many of the aquatic life down here has never seen anything like it, a
> creature causing such a great disturbance, as things scramble out of
> Abominus' way. It dosent matter however, as Abominus dosent notice it,
> there is no spark in his eyes to show he knows what is happening around
> him, he just notices one fish, that isnt leaving. Abominus stops moving,
> and begins to speak. "Grrrrrrrr.......what......do?" he asks.
